cards.title: Ludramor
setup: {Ludramor} enters play "Slick CEO" side up. The Planetcracker Barge is put into play.
Reveal cards from the villain deck until {H - 2} Executives and {H} non-Executive targets are revealed. Put the revealed cards into play and shuffle the remaining cards into the deck.
gameplay: When {Ludramor} would be dealt damage, redirect it to the other Executive with the lowest HP.
If there are no cards in the environment deck, the environment cannot play cards.
At the start of the villain turn, if there are no other Executives in play, shuffle the villain trash into the villain deck, then {Ludramor} flips.
cards.advanced: Reduce damage dealt to Executives by 1.
flippedGameplay: If there are no cards in the environment deck, the environment cannot play cards.
At the start of the villain turn, if there are at least {H - 1} other villain targets including at least 1 other Executive in play, Ludramor flips.

At the end of the villain turn, reveal cards from the villain deck until a target is revealed. Put it into play and shuffle the other revealed cards back into the villain deck. Then Ludramor deals the non-villain target with the lowest HP {H - 1} energy damage.
cards.flippedAdvanced: Increase damage dealt by Executives by 1.
cards.challengeText: The Planetcracker Barge is immune to all damage. At the end of the villain turn, destroy an environment card.

openingLines.default: It's nothing personal, you understand. We have a quota to make.
openingLines.GuardiansofTomorrow.SporeCharacter: You know me, but I can't say I remember you. Or care.
openingLines.SporeSeedOfVengeanceCharacter: Name your price, just leave me alone!
openingLines.SporeNascentHiveCharacter: Why does it matter? They would've died eventually anyway.

cards.title: Advance Scout
body: Executives and Spaceships are immune to damage from Environment cards.
cards.flavorText: UFO sightings are on the rise this week...
cards.flavorReference: Miranda Algernon, Guardians of Tomorrow Annual #7

cards.title: Biome Harvesting
body: Destroy the environment target with the lowest HP. If no card was destroyed this way, the villain target with the lowest HP deals each non-villain target 2 projectile damage. Otherwise, each Executive gains {H + 2} HP.
cards.flavorText: They're taking everything! Animals, plants,{br}even microbes out of the soil!

cards.title: Carpet Bombing
body: The Spaceship with the second lowest HP deals each non-villain target 3 fire damage.

cards.title: Chief Engineer Komac
body: Increase HP gained by Spaceships by the number of Technicians in play.
When this card would be dealt damage, redirect it to the other Technician with the lowest HP.
At the end of the villain turn, the villain Spaceship with the most missing HP gains {H - 1} HP.
cards.flavorText: Listen, if you don't break my reactors,{br}I'll overlook your trespassing.

cards.title: Colonel Prenakka
body: Increase damage dealt by Soldiers by the number of Soldiers in play.
When this card would be dealt damage, redirect it to the other Soldier with the lowest HP.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the non-villain target with the highest HP {H - 1} projectile damage.
cards.flavorText: It is she, the burner, the breaker!{br}[b]SHE MUST DIE![/b]

cards.title: Engineering Team
body: At the end of the villain turn, each villain Spaceship gains 1 HP.
cards.flavorText: They aren't combatants. Should we leave{br}them be?

cards.title: Eradicator Gunship
body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the 2 non-villain targets with the highest HP {H - 1} projectile damage each.
cards.flavorText: Get the civilians to cover! I'll handle this!

cards.title: Exterminator Squad
body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals each non-villain target 1 projectile damage.
cards.flavorText: It's time for these vermin to be removed,{br}[i]with prejudice[/i].

cards.title: Intelligence Officer Salguul
body: The first time a player discards a card each turn, they must discard 1 additional card for each Analyst in play, minus 1.
When this card would be dealt damage, redirect it to the other Analyst with the lowest HP.
At the end of the villain turn, each player must discard a card.
cards.flavorText: I predict only a 23% chance that these{br}barbarians will pose a substantial threat.

cards.title: Planetcracker Barge
body: This card is indestructible if it has any HP.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals each non-villain target energy damage equal to the number of cards in the environment trash.
When this card is destroyed, it deals each villain target 5 irreducible psychic damage, then remove this card from the game.
cards.flavorText: If my calculations are correct, we have{br}10 hours before that thing blows the{br}Earth entirely apart!

cards.title: Prospecting Initiative
body: If Intelligence Officer Salguul is in play, play the top X cards of the environment deck, where X is the number of Analysts in play.
Otherwise, search the villain trash and deck for Intelligence Officer Salguul and put him into play, then shuffle the villain deck.
cards.flavorText: We've identified valuable biologicals here,{br}here and here. Those should be your{br}first targets.

cards.title: Quash Resistance
body: If Colonel Prenakka is in play, she deals the X hero targets with the highest HP 2 energy damage each where X is the number of Soldiers in play.
Otherwise, search the villain deck and trash for Colonel Prenakka and put her into play, then shuffle the villain deck.
cards.flavorText: The little frond who escaped me on{br}Baltoras 3. What a surprise!

cards.title: Rush Repairs
body: If Chief Engineer Komac is in play, reveal cards from the villain deck until X spaceships are revealed, where X is the number of Technicians in play. Put the revealed Spaceships into play and shuffle the remaining cards into the villain deck.
Otherwise, search the villain trash and deck for Chief Engineer Komac and put him into play, then shuffle the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: [b]Are you mad!?[/b] I can't work that fast!

cards.title: Shareholder Meeting
body: If the Planetcracker Barge is in play, reveal cards from the villain deck until a target is revealed. Put the revealed target into play, then each Executive gains 5 HP.
Otherwise, {Ludramor} deals himself 5 irreducible psychic damage, then play the top card of the villain deck.
cards.flavorText: You can't hide it, [i]sir[/i]. They are aboard this{br}vessel. We are [i]losing[/i].

cards.title: Survey Department
body: At the end of the villain turn, one player must discard a card.
cards.flavorText: Give me all your data on these{br}'Guardians.'
